name: Pumpkin Ghost
description:
A war between ghosts and machines has broken out in the underworld and it's up to you the pumpkin Queen to face her old friend and put an end to this spooky Halloween themed madness!

1. 20 levels to fight in.

2. 10 bosses to defeat.

3. 21 Enemy types to face.

4. A ranking system to challenge you to get an S rank on every level.

5. RPG system to increase your health, magic and skills.

6. And a shop to buy 6 abilities.

Inspired by Touhou and Nier automata.
